content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    locationid,
    REPLACE(borough, NCHAR(0x202F), ' ') AS borough,   -- Replace U+202F with space
    REPLACE(zone, NCHAR(0x202F), ' ') AS zone,          -- Replace U+202F with space
    REPLACE(service_zone, NCHAR(0x202F), ' ') AS service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://nytaxidatastore2.dfs.core.windows.net/new-york-taxi/rides/zone_lookups/taxi_zone_lookup.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
